description.title: Motor System Identification
description.content:
This system will communicate with controller module,
Which actuates the stepper motor and collect encoder reading from digital readout (DRO).

manual.title: Manual v1.0
manual.content: Please refer to README.MD of this project

equipment.title: Equipment Lists
equipment.content:
- Stepper Motor & Driver (Nema 17)
- Digital Readout (DRO)
- Arduino Mega (Client)
- PC with user interface

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Welcome to any comment, please email stonecreek00@gmail.com
